trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents information about a dynamic get member operation that indicates if the get member should invoke properties when they perform the get operation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx x xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the value indicating if this get member operation should invoke properties when they perform the get operation.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value when this interface is not present is true.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

True if this get member operation should invoke properties when they perform the get operation; otherwise false.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
